Courses.name: Operating Systems Usage
Courses.description: This course introduces 1st year students into Operating Systems Usage. Linux is being used as a platform for introducing Operating Systems concepts such as processes and files.

Courses.name: Computer Networks
Courses.description: This course aims at helping students understand the design and inner working of Computer Netoworks.

Courses.name: Operating Systems
Courses.description: This course aims at helping students understand Operating Systems better.

Courses.name: Operating Systems Design
Courses.description: This course aims at helping students understand the internals of Operating Systems.

Courses.name: Network Design
Courses.description: This course introduces students to Network Design concepts such as switching and routing.

Courses.name: Network Services Management
Courses.description: This course presents global configuration options for Internet services (web, e-mail, DNS, FTP, remote access) and places accent on important security features that need to be implemented before the services are released.

Courses.name: Advanced Operating Systems
Courses.description: This course presents advanced concepts in operating systems as they are explored in research publications.

Courses.name: Computer Network Security
Courses.description: This course aims at providing a set of tools for vulnerability assesment and security calibration both at the network and at the operating system level.

Courses.name: Advanced ISP Services
Courses.description: This course focuses on the integration of advanced system services components and on the service reliability and scalability

Courses.name: Security for Routers and Switches
Courses.description: This course focuses ont he planification, implementation and configuration of a secure, scalable, redundant and convergent network using dedicated firewalls and Unified Threat Management

People.name: Mircea Bardac
People.paper1: Scaling Peer-to-Peer testing using Linux Containers | http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/xpls/abs_all.jsp?arnumber=5541555
People.paper3: Monitoring a BitTorrent tracker for peer-to-peer system analysis | http://www.springerlink.com/content/r528521241850jnl/
People.paper4: A distributed file system model for Shared, Dynamic and Aggregated Data | http://aimas.cs.pub.ro/people/mircea.bardac/papers/2009-cscs17-dfs-model.pdf
